creator: ibmossg_middleware@nsdl.co.in
text:
Created attachment 30986
please find attached cataliine.out

Hi All,

We are using the tomcat 6.0.35 and IBM java 1.7 .after restarting the tomcat we are getting below exceptions  and kindly let us know how to fix this exception
